with the structure of our subtle bodies
the geometry of our spirit there are
certain absolutely fundamental
structures in the energy body now these
are known by a variety of names there is
a form of energetic pillar around the
human energy body that was known as the
column of glory in the ancient Persian
Manichaean tradition and still referred
to that by that name in the Coptic
Christian tradition today it's known by
many names and various traditions it's
also related to the concept of the anta
karana the essence of the formation of
the geometry of the human energy body is
that it has a primary axis that connects
heaven and earth together that primary
axis goes from high above the crown
straight down through the midline of the
body from the crown to the perineum and
then out the base of the trunk and down
into the earth that's the primary axis
you see it being formed as the first
axis within the developing fetus in the
womb and the creation of the neural tube
and the developing fetus so this primary
axis this connecting line between heaven
and earth is the most important key axis
in the human body at the very center of
this is where we can refer to as the
golden thread it literally has a golden

center line midline of the body from

below around that infinitesimal golden
thread there is then the amount of this
